mapper.select: select count(*) from reserv_list where reserv_no > 0 and reserv_status = #{search_type} and reserv_date > to_date(#{startDate}) and reserv_date < to_date(#{endDate}) and reserv_sess like '%' || #{search_no} || '%' and reserv_name like '%' || #{search_id} || '%' and reserv_ficnic_name like '%' || #{search_name} || '%'
